text: Aspergillus costiformis is a species of fungus in the genus Aspergillus. It is from the Aspergillus section. The species was first described in 1995.H.Z. Kong & Z.T. Qi 1995, Acta Mycol. Sin. 14(1): 10 It has been reported to produce auroglaucin, dihydroauroglaucin, echinulins, epiheveadrides, flavoglaucin, isoechinulins, neoechinulins, physcion, and tetrahydroauroglaucin. == References == costiformis Category:Fungi described in 1995
title: Aspergillus costiformis
